P-value Shiny App

```{r}
library(shiny)
ui <- fluidPage(  
  sliderInput(inputId = "Z", 
              label = "Set Z score", 
              value = 0, min = -5, max = 5),
  textOutput(outputId = "Prob"),
  textOutput(outputId = "Pvalue"),
  plotOutput(outputId = "curve")
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  
  output$Prob<-renderText("P-Value")
  output$Pvalue<-renderText({1-pnorm(input$Z)
  })
  output$curve<-renderPlot({
    curve(1/sqrt(2*pi)*exp(-(x^2)/2),from=-5,to=5)
    abline(v=input$Z,col="red")
  })
}

shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
